segments.advisor_message: So, let's talk about your retirement aspirations. What are you envisioning for this time in your life?
segments.client_message: Oh, you know, I've been thinking a lot about it lately. I just want to, uh, travel a bunch, I guess. Like, maybe go to Europe for a few months or just take a road trip across the country. But I also want some time to, um, relax at home, just not feel rushed, y'know?

segments.advisor_message: That sounds like a great mix of adventure and relaxation! Do you have any current health considerations we should keep in mind for those plans?
segments.client_message: Well, uh, I'm generally okay, but I've had some, like, minor issues, nothing serious really. I mean, I don’t smoke, actually, but I do have a bit of back pain from sitting too long. Just, like, little things. I think as long as I stay active, it'll be fine. Oh, and I do have a will set up, just in case!
